description: Astrantia 'Snow Star' is a magnificent species of masterwort that is sure to capture everyone's attention. Boasting wispy white petals with delicate flecks of deep pink, it is truly a sight to behold. It will produce a profusion of blooms on sturdy stems that will tower gracefully over the other blooms in your garden. Not only is it beautiful to look at, but it is also incredibly hardy and doesn't require much maintenance. It can also tolerate drought conditions very well, making it the perfect fit for keen gardeners and those who want to add a touch of beauty to their outdoor space.
